article_title: Health Innovators In Akron Bring Accountable Care To The Community

article_metadata.description: Across the country, dozens of healthcare systems are forming so-called accountable care organizations aimed at improving patient care and outcomes while lowering costs. Innovators in Akron, Ohio, are turning this concept in a whole new direction. They've created what they call an accountable care community.
article_metadata.author: Rob Waters
